meanings.sent1: The antielitists believe everyone should have equal opportunities.
meanings.sent2: Many antielitists advocate for fair treatment of all individuals.
meanings.sent3: The antielitists joked that they were the 'people's champions'.
meanings.sent4: In a world of kings and queens, the antielitists were the rebels fighting for equality.
meanings.sent5: The antielitists stood up against the idea of a ruling class.

meanings.definition: Those who are against the power or influence of a select group of people.
meanings.sent1: The antielitists protested against the control of a few individuals.
meanings.sent2: Some antielitists work to dismantle systems of privilege.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the antielitists playfully challenged the 'chosen ones'.
meanings.sent4: The antielitists were the warriors fighting against the tyranny of the few.
meanings.sent5: In the battle for equality, the antielitists were the frontline soldiers.
